posts.title: Mi solo-efectivo sistema de sobres
posts.excerpt: For a long time I was very disorganized about my finances. I tried several apps and systems, but I wasn't able to stick to any of these, as I found all of them unnecessary complicated. So finally, I came up with my all system that's so easy even I am able to stick to it.

posts.title: Viviendo con menos
posts.excerpt: Recently I was forced to introduce budget into my life. What I took as an annoyance and necessity ended up being a blessing in disguise that brought me more mental peace, stability and sense of direction in life.
